Package org.pepstock.charba.client.defaults

Interface IsDefaultPadding

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IsPadding
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractPadding, AbstractScriptablePadding, DefaultChartPadding, DefaultPadding, Padding, Padding, Padding, Padding, Padding, PaddingItem
    public interface IsDefaultPadding
    Interface to define padding object defaults.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero
